_comment: Exploratory profile for early-stage Solana meme discovery. Focused on real liquidity ignition with low noise.
name: Exploratory
description: Early discovery mode with strict ignition and limited daily decisions

filters._comment: First defensive layer: filters obvious noise and limits daily decision fatigue
filters._comment_lp_add_min_sol: Minimum SOL added to LP (~$2k). Low threshold to catch early ignitions.
filters._comment_lp_add_min_usd: USD equivalent at ~$200/SOL for sanity checking.
filters._comment_lp_remove_min_pct: LP removal >=40% is a strong rug / failure warning.
filters._comment_volume_spike_multiplier: Early attention ignition threshold; lower is noisy, higher misses early moves.
filters._comment_max_actions_per_day: Hard cap on decisions per day to prevent overtrading.

early_stage._comment: Offensive logic: defines what 'early-stage ignition' means
early_stage._comment_near_zero_baseline_sol: Baseline liquidity below this is considered near-zero (birth stage).
early_stage._comment_min_lp_ignite_sol: LP added must be meaningful relative to near-zero baseline. Low for early discovery.
early_stage._comment_signal_window_minutes: Signals must cluster quickly or interest is weak.
early_stage._comment_min_signals_required: LP + volume (or pressure) is minimum confirmation.

auto_ignore._comment: Silent rejection rules to protect focus
auto_ignore._comment_pair_age_hours_gt: After 12h information is no longer asymmetric.
auto_ignore._comment_market_cap_usd_gt: Exclude crowded trades; market cap used only defensively.
